document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Proud </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">broken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">heart, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">break </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Proud </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">pain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">feel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Proud </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">night, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">moons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">dost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">slake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">partake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">passion, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">humility. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">boast, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Jesus, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">drunken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">companion </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">strong </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">cup </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">anguish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">brewed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Nazarene </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can'st </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">pierce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">tradition </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">peerless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">puncture, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">See! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">usurped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">crucifix </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">honor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Proud of my broken heart, since thou did'st break it
